actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged in House.
Rereferred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to restore, without remuneration, the wartime recognition of Filipino veterans of World War II who fought as members of the Commonwealth Army but whose names were stricken from the official U.S. Army records.

summary.text: Restores, without remuneration, the wartime recognition of Filipino veterans of World War II who fought as members of the Commonwealth Army but whose names were stricken from official United States Army records.

titles.title: A bill to restore, without remuneration, the wartime recognition of Filipino veterans of World War II who fought as members of the Commonwealth Army but whose names were stricken from the official U.S. Army records.
